title: Galloway on relations with British - cause

content.question: The key concern that Galloway’s plan was designed to address was the

choices.label: lack of American representation in the British Parliament
demand for back pay for veterans of the French and Indian War (SevenYears’ War)
complaint about high tariffs imposed on colonial merchants for exports to Great Britain
continuing security threat posed by the French in Canada

content.answer: lack of American representation in the British Parliament

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
